resources.title: uBlock Origin
resources.shortDescription: Efficient ad blocker for browsers with minimal resource usage
resources.longDescription: uBlock Origin is a free, open-source ad content blocker. Unlike other blockers, it's easy on memory and CPU while being capable of loading and enforcing thousands of filters. It supports multiple browsers and offers granular control over what gets blocked.

resources.title: ChatGPT
resources.shortDescription: Advanced AI language model for conversation and automation
resources.longDescription: OpenAI's ChatGPT is a state-of-the-art language model designed for natural language interactions. It can assist with coding, writing, research, and complex problem-solving.

resources.title: Free for Developers
resources.shortDescription: Massive list of free SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS offerings for developers
resources.longDescription: A comprehensive, community-driven list of software and other offerings that have free tiers for developers. Perfect for bootstrapping projects without breaking the bank.

resources.title: Open-Meteo
resources.shortDescription: Free weather API with high-resolution forecasts, no API key required
resources.longDescription: Open-Meteo is a free, open-source weather API that provides access to high-resolution weather forecast data with global coverage.

resources.title: Public APIs
resources.shortDescription: A collective list of free APIs for use in software and web development
resources.longDescription: A comprehensive collection of public APIs categorized by topic, including animals, anime, art, business, food, music, and more.

resources.title: roadmap.sh
resources.shortDescription: Community-driven roadmaps, guides, and learning paths for developers
resources.longDescription: Interactive and comprehensive roadmaps covering various tech career paths. Each roadmap provides a visual guide showing the learning path with resources.

resources.title: Kali Linux
resources.shortDescription: Leading penetration testing and security auditing Linux distribution
resources.longDescription: Kali Linux is an open-source, Debian-based Linux distribution geared towards various information security tasks.

resources.title: VS Code
resources.shortDescription: Powerful, extensible code editor for modern web development
resources.longDescription: Visual Studio Code is a lightweight but powerful source code editor available for Windows, macOS and Linux.

resources.title: GitHub
resources.shortDescription: The world's leading AI-powered developer platform
resources.longDescription: GitHub is where millions of developers shape the future of software, together. Contribute to open source and manage Git repositories.

resources.title: DevDocs
resources.shortDescription: Fast, offline-compatible, all-in-one API documentation browser
resources.longDescription: DevDocs combines multiple API documentations in a fast, organized, and searchable interface. Includes docs for 100+ technologies.

resources.title: OWASP Top 10
resources.shortDescription: Standard awareness document for web application security risks
resources.longDescription: Represents a broad consensus about the most critical security risks to web applications. Essential reading for developers.

resources.title: Regex101
resources.shortDescription: Online regex tester and debugger with real-time explanation
resources.longDescription: A powerful online tool for building, testing, and debugging regular expressions with real-time feedback.

resources.title: Can I Use
resources.shortDescription: Browser compatibility tables for web technologies
resources.longDescription: Provides up-to-date browser support tables for support of front-end web technologies on desktop and mobile browsers.

resources.title: Stack Overflow
resources.shortDescription: The largest online community for developers to learn and share
resources.longDescription: The largest, most trusted online community for developers to learn, share their programming knowledge, and build their careers.

resources.title: Antigravity
resources.shortDescription: Advanced agentic coding assistant by Google Deepmind
resources.longDescription: Antigravity is a high-performance AI coding assistant designed for complex repo-wide tasks, pair programming, and automated software engineering. It features deep codebase understanding and direct environment interaction.

resources.title: USB Army Knife
resources.shortDescription: Microcontroller-based USB attack and security testing tool
resources.longDescription: A powerful USB attack tool that can emulate keyboards, mice, and other devices for penetration testing and automated tasks.

resources.title: Open Lovable
resources.shortDescription: Open-source full-stack AI web application builder
resources.longDescription: An open alternative to high-end AI website builders that allows for rapid generation of web applications from natural language prompts.

resources.title: Transformers.js Examples
resources.shortDescription: State-of-the-art Machine Learning in your browser
resources.longDescription: A collection of examples showing how to run high-performance machine learning models directly in the browser using Transformers.js.

resources.title: Scrapling
resources.shortDescription: Modern, undetectable web scraping library
resources.longDescription: A high-performance web scraping library designed to bypass anti-bot detections with ease.

resources.title: Nanochat
resources.shortDescription: Minimalistic chat interface for LLMs
resources.longDescription: A very clean and simple chat interface for interacting with various Large Language Models via API.

resources.title: WiFi Duck
resources.shortDescription: Wireless Remote Keystroke Injection tool
resources.longDescription: A wireless USB injector that can flash scripts from a distance, useful for physical penetration testing.

resources.title: Pwnstick Lua
resources.shortDescription: Lua-powered BadUSB and automation stick
resources.longDescription: A Lua-scriptable BadUSB tool that provides advanced automation and payload execution capabilities.

resources.title: Awesome Lists
resources.shortDescription: The definitive collection of curated lists for developers
resources.longDescription: A collaborative collection of awesome lists for every programming language, platform, and framework imaginable.

resources.title: Build Your Own X
resources.shortDescription: Master list of tutorials to build complex tech from scratch
resources.longDescription: Learn how technology works by building it yourself. Tutorials for everything from operating systems to programming languages.

resources.title: Tech Interview Handbook
resources.shortDescription: Curated interview preparation materials for busy humans
resources.longDescription: A comprehensive guide to acing technical interviews at big tech companies, covering algorithms, system design, and behavioral questions.

resources.title: Back-End Developer Interview Questions
resources.shortDescription: Deep dive interview questions for backend roles
resources.longDescription: A curated list of technical topics and questions that every backend developer should know, from databases to networking.

resources.title: LeetCode Company Wise Problems
resources.shortDescription: Targeted interview preparation by company
resources.longDescription: A collection of curated LeetCode problems that frequently appear in interviews at top tech firms like FAANG.

resources.title: Project Based Learning
resources.shortDescription: Curriculum for building real apps from scratch
resources.longDescription: A list of tutorials that walk you through building real-world projects in various programming languages.

resources.title: OSSU Computer Science
resources.shortDescription: Path to a free self-taught CS degree
resources.longDescription: A comprehensive curriculum to obtain a university-level computer science education using free and open-source materials.

resources.title: Free for Dev Hub
resources.shortDescription: The original free-tier directory for developers
resources.longDescription: A massive, community-maintained list of SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS offerings that have free tiers for developers.

resources.title: is-a.dev Docs
resources.shortDescription: Free subdomains for open-source developers
resources.longDescription: Documentation and guides for getting a free .is-a.dev subdomain for your open-source projects.

resources.title: PDF24 Tools
resources.shortDescription: Free and easy-to-use online PDF tools
resources.longDescription: A comprehensive suite of free online PDF tools to merge, split, compress, and convert PDF files directly in your browser.

resources.title: shadcn/ui
resources.shortDescription: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS
resources.longDescription: An open-source collection of re-usable components that you can copy and paste into your apps. Not a component library, but a collection of components.

resources.title: BentoPDF
resources.shortDescription: Simple, clean PDF viewer and organizer
resources.longDescription: A minimalist approach to viewing and organizing your PDF documents with a focus on speed and clarity.

resources.title: Voicemeeter Banana
resources.shortDescription: Advanced Virtual Audio Mixer for Windows
resources.longDescription: An advanced audio mixer application with a virtual audio device used as a virtual I/O to mix and manage any audio sources from or to any audio devices or applications.

resources.title: Pi-hole on Ubuntu Guide
resources.shortDescription: Step-by-step guide to installing Pi-hole for network-wide ad blocking
resources.longDescription: A detailed tutorial from RaspberryTips on how to set up Pi-hole on an Ubuntu server to block ads across your entire network.

resources.title: DMCA.com
resources.shortDescription: Content protection and takedown services
resources.longDescription: The global leader in content protection services, providing tools for website owners to protect their work and manage copyright takedowns.

resources.title: Cloudflare Registrar
resources.shortDescription: No-markup domain registration and management
resources.longDescription: Highly secure domain registration service that provides domains at cost, with built-in protection against DDoS and account hijacking.

resources.title: Splunk
resources.shortDescription: Enterprise SIEM and observability platform
resources.longDescription: A flexible data platform that allows for real-time monitoring, searching, and analyzing of machine-generated big data via a searchable functional-style interface.

resources.title: IBM QRadar
resources.shortDescription: Intelligent SIEM for security analytics
resources.longDescription: An enterprise-grade SIEM that helps security teams quickly detect and prioritize threats across the entire infrastructure.

resources.title: LogRhythm
resources.shortDescription: Next-Gen SIEM for security posture
resources.longDescription: Security intelligence and analytics platform designed to unify SIEM, log management, and network monitoring.

resources.title: AlienVault OSSIM
resources.shortDescription: Open Source SIEM platform
resources.longDescription: The world's most widely used open-source SIEM, providing a complete security toolset for mid-market and managed service organizations.

resources.title: Snort
resources.shortDescription: Global standard for Network IDS/IPS
resources.longDescription: The world's foremost open-source intrusion prevention system (IPS), capable of performing real-time traffic analysis and packet logging.

resources.title: OSSEC
resources.shortDescription: Host-based Intrusion Detection System
resources.longDescription: Free and open-source host-based IDS that performs log analysis, integrity checking, Windows registry monitoring, and rootkit detection.

resources.title: CrowdStrike Falcon
resources.shortDescription: Cloud-native endpoint protection platform
resources.longDescription: The pioneer of cloud-delivered endpoint protection, providing AI-powered EDR, antivirus, and vulnerability management.

resources.title: Carbon Black
resources.shortDescription: Intrinsic security cloud for endpoints
resources.longDescription: Cloud-native endpoint security platform that combines EDR with next-gen antivirus to stop malware and non-malware attacks.

resources.title: SentinelOne
resources.shortDescription: Autonomous AI endpoint security
resources.longDescription: An autonomous cybersecurity platform that prevents, detects, and responds to attacks at machine speed using on-device AI.

resources.title: Defender for Endpoint
resources.shortDescription: Enterprise endpoint security platform
resources.longDescription: Microsoft's comprehensive endpoint security solution designed to help enterprise networks prevent, detect, investigate, and respond to advanced threats.

resources.title: TryHackMe
resources.shortDescription: Hands-on cybersecurity training through labs
resources.longDescription: A popular platform for learning cybersecurity through browser-based labs and structured learning paths for all skill levels.

resources.title: Hack The Box
resources.shortDescription: Elite gamified cybersecurity training platform
resources.longDescription: Advanced hacking labs and machines used by professionals to test and improve their penetration testing skills in a competitive environment.

resources.title: PortSwigger Academy
resources.shortDescription: Free online web security training
resources.longDescription: Comprehensive web security training from the creators of Burp Suite, covering vulnerabilities like SQLi, XSS, and more.

resources.title: OverTheWire
resources.shortDescription: Wargames for learning security concepts
resources.longDescription: A classic platform offering wargames that teach security concepts through fun and challenging CLI-based levels.

resources.title: VulnHub
resources.shortDescription: Vulnerable virtual machines for offline practice
resources.longDescription: Provides materials that allow anyone to gain practical 'hands-on' experience in digital security and network administration.

resources.title: PentesterLab
resources.shortDescription: The best way to learn web penetration testing
resources.longDescription: Practical exercises and labs focused specifically on web application security and penetration testing.

resources.title: SmuggleFuzz
resources.shortDescription: Test and exploit HTTP request smuggling vulnerabilities
resources.longDescription: A rapid tool for finding and testing HTTP Request Smuggling vulnerabilities, allowing security researchers to identify potential desync issues in proxy-server architectures.

resources.title: Troll-A
resources.shortDescription: Advanced penetration testing and red teaming simulation
resources.longDescription: A tool designed for simulating sophisticated attacks during red team operations, helping organizations test their defensive capabilities.

resources.title: apk2url
resources.shortDescription: Extract URLs from Android APK files for OSINT
resources.longDescription: A simple tool to extract all URLs and IP addresses found within an Android APK, providing valuable insight into backend infrastructure during reconnaissance.

resources.title: go-dork
resources.shortDescription: Google Dorking tool for advanced reconnaissance
resources.longDescription: Go-dork is a fast and reliable tool to automate Google Dorking, helping security professionals uncover sensitive information exposed via search engines.

resources.title: pphack
resources.shortDescription: Prototype pollution vulnerability scanner
resources.longDescription: A tool focused on identifying and testing client-side prototype pollution vulnerabilities in modern web applications.

resources.title: NetScout
resources.shortDescription: Network traffic visibility for OSINT
resources.longDescription: Provides deep visibility into network traffic and performance, useful for mapping infrastructure and conducting thorough reconnaissance.

resources.title: WAF Bypass
resources.shortDescription: Test resilience against WAF-evasive attacks
resources.longDescription: A framework for testing whether web application firewalls can be bypassed using various encoding and obfuscation techniques.

resources.title: Upload Bypass
resources.shortDescription: Exploit file upload mechanism vulnerabilities
resources.longDescription: A powerful tool to identify and exploit misconfigurations in file upload functionalities, allowing for remote code execution tests.

resources.title: 403jump
resources.shortDescription: Bypass HTTP 403 (Forbidden) pages
resources.longDescription: Automates various header-based and path-based techniques to bypass 403 Forbidden errors on web servers.

resources.title: mailMeta
resources.shortDescription: Analyze email metadata for phishing detection
resources.longDescription: A forensics tool to extract and analyze metadata from email files to trace origin and detect potential phishing attempts.

resources.title: RustRedOps
resources.shortDescription: Advanced Rust techniques for Red Team operations
resources.longDescription: A collection of libraries and proof-of-concepts for red teaming using the Rust programming language for stealth and performance.

resources.title: dnstwist
resources.shortDescription: Typosquatting and phishing detection engine
resources.longDescription: Generates domain permutations to find potentially malicious domains used for phishing or typosquatting attacks against your brand.

resources.title: FinalRecon
resources.shortDescription: All-in-one reconnaissance for target websites
resources.longDescription: A comprehensive OSINT tool for web reconnaissance, gathering headers, WHOIS information, SSL certificates, and crawling for vulnerabilities.

resources.title: Wireshark
resources.shortDescription: The world's foremost network protocol analyzer
resources.longDescription: An essential tool for network troubleshooting, analysis, and security auditing, allowing deep inspection of hundreds of protocols.

resources.title: Nmap
resources.shortDescription: Network Mapper for security auditing
resources.longDescription: A free and open-source utility for network discovery and security auditing, used by millions for port scanning and vulnerability detection.

resources.title: Shodan
resources.shortDescription: Search engine for Internet-connected devices
resources.longDescription: Shodan lets you find which devices are connected to the Internet, where they are located, and who is using them.

resources.title: Burp Suite
resources.shortDescription: Core tool for web application security testing
resources.longDescription: An integrated platform for performing security testing of web applications, used worldwide by penetration testers.

resources.title: Metasploit
resources.shortDescription: World's most used penetration testing framework
resources.longDescription: Provides information about security vulnerabilities and aids in penetration testing and IDS signature development.

resources.title: freeCodeCamp
resources.shortDescription: Learn to code for free and get certified
resources.longDescription: An interactive learning platform that offers free certifications in web development, data science, and more.

resources.title: The Odin Project
resources.shortDescription: Your career in web development starts here
resources.longDescription: A free, high-quality open-source curriculum for becoming a full-stack web developer.

resources.title: MDN Web Docs
resources.shortDescription: The definitive resource for web developers
resources.longDescription: Documentation for web technologies, including HTML, CSS, and IDs for Web APIs.

resources.title: LeetCode
resources.shortDescription: The world's leading platform for interview prep
resources.longDescription: Enhance your skills, prepare for technical interviews, and land your dream job with thousands of coding challenges.

resources.title: Project Euler
resources.shortDescription: Mathematical and computer programming challenges
resources.longDescription: A series of challenging mathematical/computer programming problems that will require more than just mathematical insights to solve.

resources.title: Certina
resources.shortDescription: Public source information gatherer
resources.longDescription: A tool designed to gather detailed information about targets from various public sources, aiding in OSINT and reconnaissance missions.

resources.title: Freeway
resources.shortDescription: Wi-Fi penetration testing tool
resources.longDescription: A tool for conducting Wi-Fi penetration testing, identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities in wireless networks and protocols.

resources.title: PingRAT
resources.shortDescription: ICMP-based C2 communication tool
resources.longDescription: Uses ICMP payloads to pass command and control traffic through firewalls undetected, demonstrating covert communication channels.

resources.title: Genzai
resources.shortDescription: IoT dashboard vulnerability scanner
resources.longDescription: Scans and analyzes IoT dashboards for vulnerabilities, focusing on default passwords and known software exploits.

resources.title: SiteDorks
resources.shortDescription: Advanced search query reconnaissance
resources.longDescription: Automates the use of advanced search queries to uncover vulnerabilities and gather detailed information on target websites.

resources.title: Aircrack-ng
resources.shortDescription: Complete suite for WiFi security auditing
resources.longDescription: A complete suite of tools to assess WiFi network security, focusing on monitoring, attacking, testing, and cracking.

resources.title: Hashcat
resources.shortDescription: The world's fastest password cracker
resources.longDescription: Advanced password recovery tool supporting over 300 highly-optimized hashing algorithms.

resources.title: HackRF One
resources.shortDescription: Software Defined Radio (SDR) platform
resources.longDescription: An open source hardware platform that can be used as a USB peripheral or programmed for stand-alone operation for RF signal analysis.

resources.longDescription: Learn to code interactively, for free. Over 50 million people have used Codecademy to learn everything from HTML to Python.

resources.shortDescription: High-quality web development courses

resources.longDescription: Access high-quality education from the world's best universities and institutions.

resources.title: Codewars

resources.longDescription: Improve your development skills by training with others on real code challenges.

resources.longDescription: A multi-month study plan for becoming a software engineer for a large tech company.

resources.title: CodeCrafters

resources.longDescription: Build your own Redis, Git, or Docker to master the internals of modern software.

resources.title: Ghidra

resources.longDescription: A software reverse engineering (SRE) framework developed by NSA's Research Directorate for analyzing compiled code.

resources.title: Nessus
resources.shortDescription: The gold standard for vulnerability assessment
resources.longDescription: A widely used vulnerability scanner that helps security professionals identify and fix security holes in their networks.

resources.title: Horus

resources.longDescription: A powerful data gathering tool featuring location tracking, IP tracing, and advanced file encryption for privacy.

resources.longDescription: Designed for rapid initial file assessment, extracting static attributes and metadata for quick malware identification.
